text: Lemon Popsicle (Israeli: Eskimo Limon, ) is a 1978 Israeli West German comedy movie directed by Boaz Davidson and starring Anat Atzmon, Zachi Noy, Jonathan Sagall, Yftach Katzur. Its success led to a series of sequels and a 1982 remake The Last American Virgin. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies directed by Boaz Davidson Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies about abortion Category:Movies about virginity Category:Movies set in Israel
title: Lemon Popsicle
